title: Continuous Training & Education
description: Undertook courses in technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind, and React. Engaged in constant documentation reading (FreeCodeCamp, StackOverflow, W3Schools). Acquired academic knowledge in SQL, SCRUM methodologies, and interface design.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed the hotel's web application from scratch. Stood out in the creation of web components and gained extensive knowledge in teamwork, task organization, and full-cycle web application development.

title: Frontend Developer
description: First approach to web development. Responsible for the design, development, and maintenance of components. Gained experience with databases (MySQL) and responsive design.
